description:
My 10 daily essential privacy tools I cannot live without! In this video I share the exact tools I use to keep myself safe from data brokers, hackers, and more. I share my go-to 2FA options, password manager, messenger, VPN, browsers, aliasing services, and so much more! 

➡️ Thank you to our open source sponsor Notesnook! Visit their site to learn more about keeping your data safe with E2EE notes, it's free to try: https://notesnook.com

*All Links In Order*
Yubikey Kickback Link: https://amzn.to/3XrAm9S
Yubikey Link: https://www.yubico.com/
My Video on using Yubikeys: https://youtu.be/8Y77o23q_tg
Proton Pass Kickback Link: https://go.getproton.me/SH12Q
Proton Pass Link: https://proton.me/pass
My Video on Proton Pass: https://youtu.be/CLwg552vhlM
All Techlore Resources: https://techlore.tech/resources
Privacy Screen Protector Kickback Link: https://amzn.to/3NFAv6i
Privacy Screen Protector Link: https://www.amazon.com/s?k=privacy+screen+protector
Signal Hardening Guide Video: https://
title: 10 Privacy Tools I Can’t Live Without
